mapper.sql: id, pay_name, pay_address, pay_contact, pay_phone, receive_name, receive_address, receive_contact, receive_phone, eid, date, phone, mobile, did, gdnum, htnum, aid, status
mapper.select: select t.*, em.id as emid,em.fullname as emname, de.id as deid,de.name as dename from delivery_order t left outer join employee em on t.eid=em.id left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did=de.id where t.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and t.status=0

select t.*, em.id as emid,em.fullname as emname, de.id as deid,de.name as dename from delivery_order t left outer join employee em on t.eid=em.id left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did=de.id where t.aid = #{aid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and t.status=0

select t.*, em.id as emid,em.fullname as emname, de.id as deid,de.name as dename from delivery_order t left outer join employee em on t.eid=em.id left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did=de.id where t.did = #{did,jdbcType=INTEGER} and t.date <= #{etime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and t.date >= #{stime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and t.status=0
mapper.insert: insert into delivery_order (id, pay_name, pay_address, pay_contact, pay_phone, receive_name, receive_address, receive_contact, receive_phone, eid, date, phone, mobile, did, gdnum, htnum, aid, status) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiveName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiveAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiveContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receivePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{employee.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dealer.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gdnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{htnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update delivery_order
pay_name = #{payName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pay_address = #{payAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pay_contact = #{payContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pay_phone = #{payPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
receive_name = #{receiveName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
receive_address = #{receiveAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
receive_contact = #{receiveContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
receive_phone = #{receivePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
eid = #{employee.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
date = #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
did = #{dealer.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
gdnum = #{gdnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
htnum = #{htnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
aid = #{aid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update delivery_order set pay_name = #{payName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_address = #{payAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_contact = #{payContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_phone = #{payPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receive_name = #{receiveName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receive_address = #{receiveAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receive_contact = #{receiveContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receive_phone = #{receivePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, eid = #{employee.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, date = #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, did = #{dealer.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gdnum = #{gdnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, htnum = #{htnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, aid = #{aid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
